avalancheActivity.highlights: The little snow present in he mountains is expected to melt during rainy weather on Sunday and Monday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: The little snow present in he mountains is expected to melt during rainy weather on Sunday and Monday.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow is in most parts of the country although most in the Westfjords and North Iceland. Warm weather and rain on Sunday will cause the snow to melt in all elevations and small, wet avalanches are expected on Sunday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow is in most parts of the country although most in the Westfjords and North Iceland. Warm weather and rain on Sunday will cause the snow to melt in all elevations.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á laugardag má gera ráð fyrir lítilsháttar éljagangi eða slyddu fyrripartinn og rólegu veðri það sem eftir lifir dags. Aðfaranótt sunnudags koma inn hlýindi í S-SA átt með töluverðri rigningu á sunnanverðu landinu fram á mánudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Multiple small sluffs released in the area in the first half of the week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Small sluffs possible on Saturday and Sunday, but then snow should mostly melt in warm weather.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Now, there is snow in the area that has settled and does not drift easily. On Sunday, warm weather with rain is forecasted. Small wet sluffs might release at first when it warms up. However, snow is expected to settle fast and mostly melt away.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow is in most parts of the country although most in the Westfjords and North Iceland. Warm weather and rain on Sunday will cause the snow to melt in all elevations and small, wet avalanches are expected on Sunday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow is in most parts of the country although most in the Westfjords and North Iceland. Warm weather and rain on Sunday will cause the snow to melt in all elevations.

weatherForecast.highlights: Frost og þurrt á laugardag. Hlýnar á sunnudag með rigningu. Hlýtt alla næstu viku.

avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow is in lower and upper elevations after snow showers in the last days and wind slabs may have formed. Wet avalanches may release during warming on Sunday and Monday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow is in lower and upper elevations after snow showers in the last days and wind slabs may have formed. Wet avalanches may release during warming on Sunday and Monday.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow is in most parts of the country although most in the Westfjords and North Iceland. Warm weather and rain on Sunday will cause the snow to melt in all elevations and small, wet avalanches are expected on Sunday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow is in most parts of the country although most in the Westfjords and North Iceland. Warm weather and rain on Sunday will cause the snow to melt in all elevations.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á laugardag má gera ráð fyrir rólegu og úrkomulausu veðri. Aðfaranótt sunnudags hvessir í S-SV og hlýindum og svolítilli vætu til fjalla.

avalancheActivity.highlights: There is little snow in the area.

snowpackStructure.highlights: There is little snow in the area. Some snowfall is expected in mountains on Saturday and early Sunday. However, on the same time temperatures should rise so the snow should settle and melt mostly straight away. Avalanche danger is considered low.

travelAdvisory.comment: New snow is in most parts of the country although most in the Westfjords and North Iceland. Warm weather and rain on Sunday will cause the snow to melt in all elevations and small, wet avalanches are expected on Sunday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New snow is in most parts of the country although most in the Westfjords and North Iceland. Warm weather and rain on Sunday will cause the snow to melt in all elevations.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma eða slydda til fjalla á laugardag en hlýnar svo fljótlega. Hlýtt upp í fjallatoppa frá og með sunnudegi.
